text: Miroslav "Miša" Aleksić (Serbian Cyrillic: Мирослав-Миша Алексић, 16 August 1953 — 29 November 2020) was a Serbian musician. He was best known as the bass guitarist for the Serbian and former Yugoslav rock band Riblja Čorba. On 29 November 2020, Aleksić died from problems caused by COVID-19 in Belgrade at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Serbian singer-songwriters Category:Serbian musicians Category:Guitarists Category:Rock singers Category:Rock musicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Belgrade
title: Miša Aleksić
